descriptionZh: AI独角兽Glean的成功凸显出其核心优势不在于追求极致的模型性能，而在于务实的工程设计，将其仅有的1%的AI能力转化为巨大的商业价值。
descriptionEn: The success of AI unicorn Glean highlights that its core strength lies not in pursuing ultimate model performance, but in pragmatically engineering and translating its mere 1% AI capability into immense business value.
